name: Catamari
description:
Fat cat needs more sausages! However make sure to plan your route carefully as he can quickly become too large to fit through small spaces.  

Move around with WASD, use space to jump and eat as much food as possible before the timer runs out. Remember, you can only eat with your face! Press escape to enter/exit fullscreen in WebGL mode.

Created by Kieran Newland, Lauren Duke and Berni Pardue.
